name: Human Flock
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN
When an ice cream appears on humans they can be grabbed

This is a very crazy game where you must hurl humans into retention zones.

This video game has been developed for the 164 weekly game jam.

Assets and font by Kenney

Screen blood from opengameart

Abduciton and UFO SFX by GameSupply

Music by Tallbeard Studios
